chardonnay.title: Chardonnay
chardonnay.description: A green-skinned grape variety used to make white wine.

pinot-noir.title: Pinot Noir
pinot-noir.description: A black wine grape variety of the species Vitis vinifera.

cabernet-sauvignon.title: Cabernet Sauvignon
cabernet-sauvignon.description: A widely recognized red wine grape variety.

zinfandel.title: Zinfandel
zinfandel.description: equivalent to the Croatian grape Crljenak Kastelanski.
